commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp create
commands.summary: Create a packet core data plane.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pcdp create --access-interface
                              --name
                              --pccp-name
                              --resource-group
                              [--location]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network pcdp create -n pcdp-name -g rg --pccp-name pccp-name --access-interface "{name:N2,ipv4Address:10.28.128.2,ipv4Subnet:10.28.128.0/24,ipv4Gateway:10.28.128.1}"

commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified packet core data plane.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network pcdp delete [--ids]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--pccp-name]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network pcdp delete -g rg -n pcdp-name --pccp-name pccp-name -y

commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp list
commands.summary: List all the packet core data planes associated with a packet core control plane.
examples: az mobile-network pcdp list -g rg --pccp-name pccp_name

commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified packet core data plane.
examples: az mobile-network pcdp show -g rg -n pcdp-name --pccp-name pccp-name

commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp update
commands.summary: Update packet core data planes tags.
examples: az mobile-network pcdp update -n pcdp_name -g rg --pccp-name pccp-name --tags "{tag:test,tag2:test2}"

commands.name: az mobile-network pcdp wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
